name: Wind Eater
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: The Wind Eater is a Medium Undead creature characterized by its stealth and cunning nature, featuring high Dexterity and an eerie ability to become invisible and silent.
memorable: Its ability to silence its surroundings and manipulate illusions makes it a tactical threat in combat.
goals: To ambush and disorient enemies while manipulating the battlefield with illusions.
relations: Often encountered alone but may serve darker masters or ally with other stealthy undead creatures.
environment: Typical habitats are darkened or shadowy locales where it can utilize its supernatural abilities effectively.
strengths: Immunities to poison and various conditions allow for high survivability; truesight aids in detecting hidden foes.
weaknesses: Its low Strength makes it less effective in direct melee combat.
attacks: Uses claw attacks that deal slashing damage, combined with high stealth to avoid detection.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Silence creates a debilitating area of effect around the Wind Eater, limiting enemies' perception and causing deafness.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Excels in Stealth and Perception, making it a master of ambush and detection avoidance.
additional_information: Can become invisible in dim light or darkness
Creates illusions with its innate spellcasting
Can move through objects, enhancing tactical positioning
Has a potent ability to manipulate the battlefield
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows it to cast silent image, blur, major image, and mirage arcane without material components.
test_queries: cunning undead with aura of silence
undead with truesight and stealth abilities
manipulative creature using illusions in darkness
